channel.title: Comments on: The founding of MirandaNet

item.title: By: Allison Allen
item.dc:creator: Allison Allen
item.description: Scoop was a pivotal project in schools, involving use of technology to provide the reality of the context. I found my copy recently - great memories of totally engaged, excited pupils!
item.content:encoded: Scoop was a pivotal project in schools, involving use of technology to provide the reality of the context. I found my copy recently – great memories of totally engaged, excited pupils!
